column5: I have a bunch of old fishing line that I would like to get rid of. Does anyone know of any spots that I can take it too. I use to take it to Lou at Simcoe Bait. Thanks Scooter
Stuff in a 2 litre pop bottle and put it out with the blue bin !
Really !! It's okay to do that?
Dont see why not its plastic.
Awesome wealth of knowledge.    Edit: Forgot the "E" in Aw"E"some.

It heads it in the right direction at least.. and trust me the crap they're making from reground pop bottles isn't going to be effected by a few ounces of what ever molecular structure of fishing line you're using. Not that I know anything about plastics.....
That's a great idea Wayne,I bring mine home and right in the garbage. As you said,it's at least heading in the right direction!
hehehe.  I never even considered it Wayne. A great idea indeed.
It rare that someone is trying to be helpful when they tell you to stuff it!
28 years in the plastics business and definitely not the first time I told someone to stuff it !
